name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 23, a student exposed a fire in the dormitory building of the Guangming Department of Shenzhen Experimental School, questioning whether the school's fire-fighting facilities were just for show.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 23, the A-share Science and Technology Innovation 50 hit a new low
At the same time, the battle to defend 2,900 points began.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 23, several celebrities were banned for speaking out against animal cruelty, sparking heated discussions among netizens. Weibo then urgently lifted the ban on them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[This prosperous age is what you wish for]
On October 23, the cat-torturing blogger "Jack Latiao" who had a bad influence before suddenly made a comeback on Weibo, posted a long article to denounce "fake animal protection" and said that he loves small animals.
At the same time, he updated more than a dozen cat-torturing videos on his website.
The cat-torturing blogger who was hated by everyone a few months ago is now hailed as a "cat-killing hero", and we have to sigh that "the times create heroes".
This prosperous age is what you wish for!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A netizen found that in Beijing, the Chaoyang Branch alone hired dog-catching companies to assist in law enforcement projects, with an annual amount of more than 2 million yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 23, the official WeChat account of Bayuquan District, Yingkou City, Liaoning Province refuted the rumor, calling the information "false information".
In fact, some netizens who are familiar with the situation said that local buses have been suspended several times during the epidemic due to insufficient funds.
This time, the government could not even issue operating subsidies and was forced to suspend operations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At a time when universities are becoming more like high schools and high schools are becoming more like Hengshui schools, international schools are also facing the transformation of becoming more like general high schools. On October 20, Beijing Lize International School issued a notice, making a series of regulations on students' appearance, classroom standard behavior, speech and rhetoric.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens have discovered that Wuhan University's School of Computer Science has added a number of compulsory courses to its new first-level undergraduate training program in 2023, including Xi Jinping's Special Needs, Labor Education with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, National Security Education, Four Histories Education, and the addition of "Chinese Spiritual Guidance" to general education.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 23, the owners of the unfinished building of Nanchang Honghai Xiyuan wanted to go to the gate of the provincial government to ask for an explanation, but they were blocked by a large number of police before they could get close.
It is reported that the delivery of Nanchang Honghai Xiyuan has been delayed for more than two years and the construction has been suspended until now.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Later, the official confirmed that late at night on October 22, the Sanhejian government issued a situation report stating that public officials were indeed involved in stealing sorghum.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 21, Jilin City, Jilin Province issued a notice that it would crack down on inappropriate remarks that smeared and negatively impacted the real estate market.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 23, a banner was hung in front of the new teaching building of Changzhi Medical College demanding salary.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 23, the Gansu Market Supervision Administration's "City Talk" column conducted a surprise inspection of the canteen of Gansu Agricultural University.
Initially, the inspection results were normal, but then a student reminded to check the halal canteen (2 minutes and 13 seconds), and the hygiene level began to plummet.
The video was deleted after it sparked public discussion, so netizens began to upload it in succession.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 23, it was reported online that the second-hand Apple market was hit by a bomb, and a large number of second-hand dealers' funds were frozen by the Anti-Fraud Center on suspicion of "money laundering". Many people were taken away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 23, the domestic food technology website "Food Partner Network" released statistics on the US FDA's refusal to import Chinese food in the third quarter of 2023.
Among them, many dairy products and baked products are suspected of containing melamine and/or melamine analogs.
The original text has been 404

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 23, a Xiaohongshu netizen revealed that he had not returned to China for 4 years in Australia. As a result, when he took a plane back to China and transferred in Hainan, he found that his passport had been cancelled by the police station where he was registered.
And Hainan Customs said that they often encounter this situation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 23, Duoyi Network continued to attack the Guangzhou Public Security Bureau

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 20, a group of people were fighting with weapons in the street near Messi Square in Ziyang, Sichuan, and some people were injured. According to eyewitnesses at the scene, a group of students suspected to be from a vocational high school fought with a group of young people outside the school. Some of them were holding knives and some were holding sticks. A boy was beaten and bleeding by the other side. This should be the third group fight incident I have received this week.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some entertainment celebrities claimed that Yang Di and others were banned for "inciting and spreading rumors". This is false.
Because if it was "inciting and spreading rumors", it would not be unblocked.
In fact, the recent work focus of the Cyberspace Administration of China is
1. Content related to killing cats and dogs must not be on the hot search;
2. Closely monitor the direction of related human rights, women's rights, extreme cases, etc. derived from killing cats and dogs;
3. Pay close attention to the relevant speeches and fan movements of celebrities and celebrities.
Yang Di and others should have violated the third article.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 23, a teacher at Taiyuan University of Technology protested on campus that the principal "harmed students' studies and forced teachers to break the law."
